title: Bored Metalheads, come here to gimme your list of top five bands
body:
I'm a melodic death/power metal guy, so I won't have Iron Maiden or Metallica on this list, though I do love them
Here's mine:

1. Scar Symmetry
2. In Flames (minus Siren Charms. I pretend that one doesn't exist)
3. Mercenary
4. Blind Guardian
5. Solution .45
